text: So Yummy Exactly one year ago today, Chrissy Teigen asked for six brown bananas on Twitter and within seconds had half of Los Angeles frantically offering up their darkest, sweetest, most flaccid bananas. “ If u have 6 BROWN bananas in the L. A. area, I will send my assistant to your home with a signed cookbook, John ’ s underwear and a Becca palette, ” the social media queen and cookbook author posted. Turns out, Teigen was making banana bread for her second cookbook, Cravings : Hungry For More. The sequel came out on the 18th and does not disappoint.
